name: Adam Lippes X OKA Set of Three Very Useful Everett Trays Multi
description: Fashion designer Adam Lippes has once again brought his discerning eye for design to OKA. Proving that stripes never go out of style, the playful take on a classic ticking stripe decorates these Everett Trays in three different colours. So named after Mount Everett – which has fantastic views of the Berkshires, Massachusetts, where Adam resides – the masculine pattern adorns each of the three sizes.
